import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; function Room({ room }) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

{room.name}

Type: {room.roomType}

Max Count: {room.maxCount}

Phone Number: {room.phoneNumber}

Email: {room.email}

Rent Per Day: {room.rentPerDay} INR

{room.name} {room.description}
) } export default Room;
